title: CID grills IGP, STF Commandant over May 9 incidents
body_lines: The Criminal Investigations Division (CID) is currently recording statements from IGP C.D. Wickramaratne and the Commandant of the STF over the incidents which took place at Kollupitiya and Galle Face on May 9.
Also the CID yesterday recorded a statement from MP Namal Rajapaksa, the son of former Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa, for several hours over the incident.
